scan_qr_description: Scan a QR code to quickly access shortened links.
shorten_link_description: Shorten your links for easier sharing.
register_description: Register to experience the service of
forgot_password_description: By entering your email, we will send you instructions to reset your password.
reset_password_description: Fill in the information below to reset your password.
upload_qr_description: Click or drag & drop to upload your QR image.
decode_qr_error: Failed to decode QR. Please try another image.
decode_qr_description: Here is the link from your QR code, click the button below to access.
scan_qr_code_description: Turn on the camera and scan a QR code to quickly access links.
cannot_detect_qr_code: Unable to detect QR code. Please try again.
camera_permission_denied: Camera access denied. Please grant permission to use this feature.
shorten_link_success: Link shortened successfully. Below are your QR code and shortened link.
download_qr_error: Failed to download QR image. Please try again.
get_link_pw_description: This link is protected. Please enter the password to access.
confirm_delete_description: To confirm deletion, please enter "{{requiredText}}" in the field below.
update_url_description: Update the URL information below. Enter a new password or leave it blank if you don’t want to set a password for this link.
